Package it.polimi.ingsw.am42.network.rmi

Class RMIHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am42.network.rmi.RMIHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
RMISpeaker, Remote
public class RMIHandler extends Object implements RMISpeaker
Auxiliary class needed for RMI clients to interact with controller
See Also:
  • Controller
  • Transforms custom exceptions into RemoteExceptions

    • createGame

      public int createGame(MessageListener l, String nickname, int numPlayers) throws RemoteException
      Method to create new game
      Specified by:
      createGame in interface RMISpeaker
      Parameters:
      l - Reference to the calling object, used to receive notification for observer pattern
      nickname - Name of the player
      numPlayers - Number of players that are going to play the game
      Returns:
      0 if game successfully created, otherwise an exception is raised
      Throws:
      NumberPlayerWrongException - if the numPlayers provided is not in the possible interval
      GameFullException - if the game has already all players connected
      NicknameInvalidException - if the nickname doesn't have a valid format
      NicknameAlreadyInUseException - if the nickname has already been chosen by another player
      RemoteException

    • connect

      public boolean connect(MessageListener l, String nickname) throws RemoteException
      Standard way of connecting to newly created game
      Specified by:
      connect in interface RMISpeaker
      Parameters:
      l - Reference to the calling object, used to receive notification for observer pattern
      nickname - Name of the player
      Returns:
      true if the connection works without problems, otherwise it throws an exception
      Throws:
      GameFullException - if the game has already all players connected
      NicknameInvalidException - if the nickname doesn't have a valid format
      NicknameAlreadyInUseException - if the nickname has already been chosen by another player
      RemoteException

      public boolean place(String p, Face face, Position position) throws RemoteException
      Method called by the current player to place a specific face on a specific position
      Specified by:
      place in interface RMISpeaker
      Parameters:
      p - Nickname of method caller
      face - Selected Face
      position - Selected Position
      Returns:
      true if placed successfully, otherwise throws an exception
      Throws:
      RequirementsNotMetException - if the player's board doesn't fulfill the face requirements
      RemoteException
